summary: Removed underwear from Nightasy\'s Ultra Skimpy pack.
descriptionHtml:
You Call That Skimpy? armor pack for UNP normal bodies.

skimpÂ·y
Adjective:

1. (of clothes) Short and revealing.
2. Providing or consisting of less than is needed; meager.

Basically just removed the underwear from Nightasy\'s Ultra Skimpy pack.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 First of all, I made this for myself because it is more pleasurable to look at, and it came about while learning to work with NIFSkope. My next project is making original armor in 3DStudio MAX. I may or may not share depending on the results. I am learning to use MAX at the same time, since I only know XSI Softimage and ZBRUSH. I tried Blender too, but it seems too much work per file. Anyway, it might be a while off, since I also want to actually play the game a bit.. :p Barely get time for that as it it.
 Secondly, when I think of skimpy, I go by the dictionary, which says \"consisting of less than needed/short and revealing\". I was thinking of calling this \"Sluts of Skyrim\", but I learned the SOS acronym was taken and it would probably just scare people away anyway. That and with a title like that you\'d more expect a face/body changing mod as well, and this is only armor/clothes, so..
 Thirdly, I only shared this because malevolent96 asked for it. You\'re welcome! ;D

Finally, I would like to add that for me personally this does not break so-called \"immersion\" at all. In a fantasy themed game where giant rats carry gold with them and dragons digest whole sword and suits of armor without disintegration I would argue that immersion is what you make of it. What I would call \"immersion-breaking\" is something like giant robots flying around in \"Vote Obama/Santorum (yes, I know, it\'s really possible *shudder*)\" shirts and an arcade hall in Whiterun and stuff like that (though it would be cool to have mini-games in Skyrim (something to think about for you master modders ;D ))..

Hope you all enjoy! Thanks again for all the comments and don\'t forget to thank the true creators of this mod, Nightasy and Dimon99!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
To install, copy to Skyrim\\Data

To remove, see readme.txt

Version History:

v1.1: Added Mageapprentice, fixed some other armors.
v1.2: Added Magejourneyman and Optional Leather, fixed some other armors.

All credit goes to:

Dimon99 - UNP Body http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
Nightasy - Ultra Skimpy Armor http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9546
JohnBSkyrim - Puppeteer Master http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10870
Skree000 - Fountain of Youth - Beauty Project http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2535
Foretrenty - Skyrim NPC Editor http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4554
Bethesda - Skyrim http://www.elderscrolls.com/skyrim/
